veterinaryInsights.text:
Small Animal Hospital
      
    
          
        
          College of Veterinary Medicine

sentences:
Small Animal Hospital
      
    
          
        
          College of Veterinary Medicine

veterinaryInsights.text: Your pet’s well-being is our top priority We provide comprehensive medical and surgical care for dogs, cats, birds, and exotic pets, utilizing advanced diagnostics, modern surgical suites, and cutting-edge technologies to treat even the most complex conditions. Emergencies pharmacy Referring Veterinarians About the small animal hospital UF Small Animal HOspital Emergencies Open for emergency patients 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Call (352) 392-2235 if you have an emergency. After 5 p.m. Monday through Friday, on weekends, and on holidays your call will be forwarded to the emergency clinician on duty or an ICU technician. Learn More UF Small Animal Hospital Specialty Services Our hospital offers a variety of veterinary specialty services staffed by board-certified specialists, residents, interns, and skilled veterinary technicians. With many specialists in one location, we provide advanced diagnostic and treatment options for cats, dogs, birds, exotics, and wildlife. All Services UF Small Animal Hospital Primary Care & Dentistry Primary Care and Dentistry provides well-pet care and advanced dog and cat dentistry, including routine cleanings, in a university setting with access to specialty services. Our doctors serve as a resource for Florida veterinarians on small animal dentistry advancements and offer interns and students the opportunity to become excellent general practice veterinarians. Learn More UF Small animal hospital Clinical Studies The University of Florida Small Animal Hospital and Large Animal Hospital offer clinical studies for dogs, cats, other small animals and large animals to determine efficacy and safety for future treatments, therapies, and diagnostic tools. All Clinical Studies UF Small Animal hospital Leading Referral Facility in Florida & Southeast We are committed to offering the best-possible treatment for your pet via a wide range of expertise in many specialties. Learn more American Animal Hospital Association (AAHA) Accredited Play Video Hours, location, and contact UF Small animal hospital Location and Contact Information 2089 SW 16th Ave.Gainesville, FL 32608(352) 392-2235smallanimal@ufl.edu Get Directions uf small animal hospital Hours of Operation Monday through Friday: 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.Saturday: Discharges ONLY 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. UF Small Animal Hospital Emergency Hours 24/7, Including Holidays (function (id, win, doc) { win.televet = win.televet || { id }; win.otto = win.otto || { id }; var o = doc.createElement('script'); o.async = true; o.src = 'https://connect.televet.com/shim.js'; var r = doc.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; r.parentNode.insertBefore(o, r); })('cljhfxs3m0050yb01xsi86oqv', window, document); Quick Links Animal Owners Emergencies PETS Ocala Large Animal Hospital World Equestrian Center-Ocala Clinical Trials Pet Loss Support Pay Your Bill Online Veterinarians Large Animal Referrals Small Animal Referrals Diagnostic Labs Clinical Trials Students DVM Admissions Graduate Studies Veterinary Graduate Student Association Internships and Residencies Faculty / Staff Faculty Directory Research Departments Human Resources Staff Intranet (requires GatorLink login) Alumni / Friends Donors and Friends Make a Gift Online Pet Memorial Program Jobs

              We provide comprehensive medical and surgical care for dogs, cats, birds, and exotic pets, utilizing advanced diagnostics, modern surgical suites, and cutting-edge technologies to treat even the most complex conditions

With many specialists in one location, we provide advanced diagnostic and treatment options for cats, dogs, birds, exotics, and wildlife

          Primary Care and Dentistry provides well-pet care and advanced dog and cat dentistry, including routine cleanings, in a university setting with access to specialty services
Our doctors serve as a resource for Florida veterinarians on small animal dentistry advancements and offer interns and students the opportunity to become excellent general practice veterinarians

veterinaryInsights.text: Your pet’s well-being is our top priority We provide comprehensive medical and surgical care for dogs, cats, birds, and exotic pets, utilizing advanced diagnostics, modern surgical suites, and cutting-edge technologies to treat even the most complex conditions. Emergencies pharmacy Referring Veterinarians About the small animal hospital UF Small Animal HOspital Emergencies Open for emergency patients 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Call (352) 392-2235 if you have an emergency. After 5 p.m. Monday through Friday, on weekends, and on holidays your call will be forwarded to the emergency clinician on duty or an ICU technician. Learn More UF Small Animal Hospital Specialty Services Our hospital offers a variety of veterinary specialty services staffed by board-certified specialists, residents, interns, and skilled veterinary technicians. With many specialists in one location, we provide advanced diagnostic and treatment options for cats, dogs, birds, exotics, and wildlife. All Services UF Small Animal Hospital Primary Care & Dentistry Primary Care and Dentistry provides well-pet care and advanced dog and cat dentistry, including routine cleanings, in a university setting with access to specialty services. Our doctors serve as a resource for Florida veterinarians on small animal dentistry advancements and offer interns and students the opportunity to become excellent general practice veterinarians. Learn More UF Small animal hospital Clinical Studies The University of Florida Small Animal Hospital and Large Animal Hospital offer clinical studies for dogs, cats, other small animals and large animals to determine efficacy and safety for future treatments, therapies, and diagnostic tools. All Clinical Studies UF Small Animal hospital Leading Referral Facility in Florida & Southeast We are committed to offering the best-possible treatment for your pet via a wide range of expertise in many specialties. Learn more American Animal Hospital Association (AAHA) Accredited Play Video Hours, location, and contact UF Small animal hospital Location and Contact Information 2089 SW 16th Ave.Gainesville, FL 32608(352) 392-2235smallanimal@ufl.edu Get Directions uf small animal hospital Hours of Operation Monday through Friday: 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.Saturday: Discharges ONLY 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. UF Small Animal Hospital Emergency Hours 24/7, Including Holidays (function (id, win, doc) { win.televet = win.televet || { id }; win.otto = win.otto || { id }; var o = doc.createElement('script'); o.async = true; o.src = 'https://connect.televet.com/shim.js'; var r = doc.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; r.parentNode.insertBefore(o, r); })('cljhfxs3m0050yb01xsi86oqv', window, document); Quick Links Animal Owners Emergencies PETS Ocala Large Animal Hospital World Equestrian Center-Ocala Clinical Trials Pet Loss Support Pay Your Bill Online Veterinarians Large Animal Referrals Small Animal Referrals Diagnostic Labs Clinical Trials Students DVM Admissions Graduate Studies Veterinary Graduate Student Association Internships and Residencies Faculty / Staff Faculty Directory Research Departments Human Resources Staff Intranet (requires GatorLink login) Alumni / Friends Donors and Friends Make a Gift Online Pet Memorial Program Jobs

veterinaryInsights.text: UF Small Animal Hospital Specialty Services Our hospital offers a variety of veterinary specialty services staffed by board-certified specialists, residents, interns, and skilled veterinary technicians. With many specialists in one location, we provide advanced diagnostic and treatment options for cats, dogs, birds, exotics, and wildlife. All Services

veterinaryInsights.text: UF Small Animal Hospital Primary Care & Dentistry Primary Care and Dentistry provides well-pet care and advanced dog and cat dentistry, including routine cleanings, in a university setting with access to specialty services. Our doctors serve as a resource for Florida veterinarians on small animal dentistry advancements and offer interns and students the opportunity to become excellent general practice veterinarians. Learn More

veterinaryInsights.text: UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA Animal Hospitals Need animal care? Visit the UF Small Animal and Large Animal Hospitals. From dogs, cats, birds and exotics to horses, cattle, llamas, pigs and many other large farm or food animals, our experienced veterinary staff is ready to assist. Learn More

veterinaryInsights.text: Syndicated Podcast Animal Airwaves Animal Airwaves is a daily radio series that features one-minute segments relating to animal health, ranging from insights into animal behavior to veterinary patient care breakthroughs and trends. Listen In

Learn More UF Small Animal Hospital Specialty Services Our hospital offers a variety of veterinary specialty services staffed by board-certified specialists, residents, interns, and skilled veterinary technicians. researchFindings.text: University of Florida IFAS As part of both the Institute of Food and Agricultural Sciences and UF Health, Veterinary Medicine is dedicated to advancing animal, human and environmental health through teaching, research, extension and patient care. Visit IFAS
